nodes.text: If I get the government to steal your pig, give it to me, and then I throw pig droppings at you all year and then keep all the pork, that is fascist economic theory.  See the difference???

I see the difference, but that's not what Obama is trying to do. He got us to buy the pig at a firesale and is hoping to make money selling it back to the original farmer or give it to the fieldhands.
